title: Grilled Chicken With Cherries, Shallots, And Arugula
summary: Grilled Chicken With Cherries, Shallots, And Arugulan is a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal recipe with 2 servings. One serving contains 224 calories, 2g of protein, and 14g of fat. For $1.6 per serving, this recipe covers 6% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. It will be a hit at your The Fourth Of July event. 24 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of chicken breast, coarse salt and pepper, olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 16 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 51%. This score is solid. Try Creamy Polenta with Chicken, Caramelized Shallots, Arugula, Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Cherries and Shallots, and Grilled Chicken Salad With Cherries for similar recipes.
